note:
Aged human with all the faults and graces we possess. Secular Buddhist, author and teacher. Podcaster about deadly dull subjects for all 5 or 6 followers. No interest in comics, movies, pop music or fashion. Or crowds. Or people in general. Four-leggeds are preferable.
Love the energy and bravery of the Young; abhor greed for attention and money. Bald, 10 lbs heavier than when I was 40, take very little seriously and love, love, love the diversity here.

Thanks, Little Ones, for including me.
